bill.summary:
IDEA Parity for Outlying Areas Act
This bill modifies funding for special education in Guam, the U.S. Virgin Islands, American Samoa, the Northern Marianas Islands, the Marshall Islands, the Federated States of Micronesia, and the Republic of Palau, including by eliminating certain limits on such funding and establishing minimum funding levels.
